term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - shut-down state in analysis
term.title: shut-down state

item.text: The condition of an instrument when it is switched off to conserve energy or reagents or to protect working parts. This term is of particular importance in clinical chemistry.

sources.item: PAC, 1989, 61, 1657. 'Nomenclature for automated and mechanised analysis (Recommendations 1989)' on page 1664 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac198961091657)
